item.title: Tesla shares drop 5%, continuing to slide as post-election rally loses steam
item.description: Tesla shares slipped 5% in U.S. premarket trading Friday, extending losses from earlier in the week.

item.title: 'Tariffs all the way': Trump says European Union must buy U.S. oil and gas in trade ultimatum
item.description: Donald Trump made threats of sweeping tariffs on U.S. trading partners a key part of his presidential campaign.

item.title: Novo Nordisk shares plunge 22% after CagriSema obesity drug trial results
item.description: Shares of Danish pharmaceutical giant Novo Nordisk plummeted more than 22% on Friday after reporting results in a late-stage trial that missed expecta...

item.title: Russian central bank surprises markets by holding key rate at 21%
item.description: Russia's central bank on Friday left its key interest rates unchanged at 21%, citing monetary tightness as Moscow wages its ongoing battle with sky-sc...

item.title: German stocks are massively outperforming their European peers. Here's why
item.description: The gains in Germany have surpassed those in Europe and are closer to performances seen stateside.
